information.name: smsmasivos
information.description: This plugin is a Fork from SMS notifier - Twilio for sends SMS notifications via smsmasivos.com.mx.
author: Librandon Jesus Vargas Villegas
Ubiquiti Networks, Inc.

configuration.label: SMS Masivos Country Code
configuration.description: It is requested for standardization purposes that the code 52, which corresponds to Mexico, or 1 for the USA.

configuration.label: invoice.add
configuration.description: Example: Created invoice %%invoice.number%% for %%invoice.total%% %%invoice.currencyCode%% for client %%client.companyName%%%%client.firstName%% %%client.lastName%%.

configuration.label: invoice.add_draft
configuration.description: Example: Created draft of invoice for %%invoice.total%% %%invoice.currencyCode%% for client %%client.companyName%%%%client.firstName%% %%client.lastName%%.

configuration.label: invoice.draft_approved
configuration.description: Example: Created invoice %%invoice.number%% for %%invoice.total%% %%invoice.currencyCode%% for client %%client.companyName%%%%client.firstName%% %%client.lastName%%.

configuration.label: invoice.delete
configuration.description: Example: Deleted invoice %%invoice.number%% for %%invoice.total%% %%invoice.currencyCode%% for client %%client.companyName%%%%client.firstName%% %%client.lastName%%.

configuration.label: invoice.edit
configuration.description: Example: Edited invoice %%invoice.number%% for %%invoice.total%% %%invoice.currencyCode%% for client %%client.companyName%%%%client.firstName%% %%client.lastName%%.

configuration.label: invoice.near_due
configuration.description: Example: Near due invoice %%invoice.number%% for %%invoice.total%% %%invoice.currencyCode%% for client %%client.companyName%%%%client.firstName%% %%client.lastName%%.

configuration.label: invoice.overdue
configuration.description: Example: Overdue invoice %%invoice.number%% for %%invoice.total%% %%invoice.currencyCode%% for client %%client.companyName%%%%client.firstName%% %%client.lastName%%.

configuration.label: payment.add
configuration.description: Example: Received payment for %%payment.amount%% %%payment.currencyCode%% from  client %%client.companyName%%%%client.firstName%% %%client.lastName%%.

configuration.label: payment.delete
configuration.description: Example: Deleted payment for %%payment.amount%% %%payment.currencyCode%% from  client %%client.companyName%%%%client.firstName%% %%client.lastName%%.

configuration.label: payment.edit
configuration.description: Example: Edited payment for %%payment.amount%% %%payment.currencyCode%% from client %%client.companyName%%%%client.firstName%% %%client.lastName%%.

configuration.label: payment.unmatch
configuration.description: Example: Unmatched payment for %%payment.amount%% %%payment.currencyCode%% from client %%client.companyName%%%%client.firstName%% %%client.lastName%%.
